properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 24 at 2:02PM PST until January 26 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Steep 10 to 15 foot combined seas, highest this afternoon
and evening as 18 second period west-northwest swell peaks.
Southerly winds 10 to 20 kt today will increase to 20 to 30 kt
late tonight into early Saturday morning. There will be a brief
period of diminished winds early Saturday afternoon before
increasing again to to 20 to 30 kt Saturday evening. Gale gusts
will be possible with each increase in winds.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Steep seas will make conditions difficult to hazardous
for small craft. Building long period swell will result in
increasingly more breaking waves at bar crossings. Use extra
caution crossing bars today as long period swell continues to
build. Increasing winds tonight into Saturday will steepen seas
further.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that winds and seas will create a
potential hazard to smaller vessels and inexperienced mariners.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST SUNDAY
